pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṁ aññatarassa pūgassa saṅghassa sacīvarabhattaṁ paṭiyattaṁ hoti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.4: Atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū yena so pūgo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.9: “Bahū, āvuso, saṅghassa dāyakā, bahū saṅghassa bhattā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.10: Ime tumhe nissāya tumhe sampassantā idha viharanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.11: Tumhe ce imesaṁ na dassatha, atha ko carahi imesaṁ dassati?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.13: Atha kho so pūgo chabbaggiyehi bhikkhūhi nippīḷiyamāno yathāpaṭiyattaṁ cīvaraṁ chabbaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ datvā saṅghaṁ bhattena parivisi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.14: Ye te bhikkhū jānanti saṅghassa sacīvarabhattaṁ paṭiyattaṁ “na ca jānanti chabbaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ dinnan”ti te evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.17: Yathāpaṭiyattaṁ cīvaraṁ ayyā chabbaggiyā ayyānaṁ chabbaggiyānaṁ pariṇāmesun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.18: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.19: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ puggalassa pariṇāmessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.20: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ puggalassa pariṇāmethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.23: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ puggalassa pariṇāmessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.25: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.26.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ puggalassa pariṇāmeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.1.6: sāmaṁ vā jānāti, aññe vā tassa ārocenti, so vā āroceti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.1.12: “dassāma karissāmā”ti vācā bhinnā hoti, taṁ puggalassa pariṇāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.2.1: Pariṇate pariṇatasaññī puggalassa pariṇāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.2.2: Pariṇate vematiko puggalassa pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.2.4: Saṅghassa pariṇataṁ aññasaṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.2.5: Cetiyassa pariṇataṁ aññacetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.2.6: Puggalassa pariṇataṁ aññapuggalassa vā saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.3.3: “yattha tumhākaṁ deyyadhammo paribhogaṁ vā labheyya paṭisaṅkhāraṁ vā labheyya ciraṭṭhitiko vā assa yattha vā pana tumhākaṁ cittaṁ pasīdati tattha dethā”ti bhaṇati,
